title: The Scarlet Cruise Ship - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Mystery   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Crime   Criminals   Detectives   Modern Day   Thriller
author: Hai Jingluo   海鶄落
description:
Private detective Du Han accepted a seemingly ordinary case: help a woman investigate her cheating husband.

But after boarding the cruise ship, deaths occurred one after another.

Werewolf card that fell on the scene, and the seemingly gentle tourist who really helped him….>
